original_title: Hank Danger and the Riddle Mountain Curse
overview: While on vacation in a spooky holiday lodge with his associate Elsie Coli, Hank Danger meets a mysterious princess telling him she needs a new bodyguard, to which he offers to help. Soon, Hank Danger is surrounded by murder, monsters, and mystery galore!
title: Hank Danger and the Riddle Mountain Curse
